name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior ML Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications within healthcare and financial sectors. Expertise in **PyTorch**, **TorchVision**, **OpenCV**, and **Pillow** for advanced machine learning model development and image processing. Proficient in deploying solutions on **AWS** along with experience in containerization using **Docker** and orchestration with **Kubernetes**. Skilled in building AI/ML-powered platforms, integrating **FastAPI** for backend services, and leveraging ML workflows with **ZenML**.
Strong background in MLOps, focusing on model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Experienced in creating monitoring solutions with **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **OpenTelemetry**. Well-versed in implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines, while ensuring compliance with industry standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS.
